title.rendered: Custom Builder Highlights New Options for Artisan Fire Bowls Collection

content.rendered:
The fall issue of Custom Builder listed the latest additions to Eldorado Stone’s Artisan Fire Bowls collection as some of the industry’s newest products.

The editor writes, “Eldorado Stone has introduced six new options to its Artisan Fire Bowls collection. The line bridges rustic and sophisticated design, as each handcrafted fire bowl has slight variations in color and shape.”
